nodes.text: The Grizmallt nerf was a rare species of nerf native to the planet Grizmallt, though also raised on Alderaan. It was very different in appearance from the standard nerf, with long legs, sparse hair, a short tail, and a long snout, as well as deer-like antlers. In fact, con artists sometimes tied antlers to the heads of eopies and tried to pass them off to naïve collectors as Grizmallt nerfs.
